name: ROBOT-CAT | (SCRATCH GAME JAM #6 theme: Portal)
description:
*************************************************************

Controls:

move up/down : mouse

shoot: any key (for example space)

*************************************************************

goal:

avoid the portals or shoot them (to get a higher score)

collect the coins to increase your score even more

survive a certain amount of time to win the game

*************************************************************

thanks for playing!
